txt.en: Wanted: Large finger bones from the barrow-wights stalking Tyrn Gorthad in Cardolan. Claim them from their wretched hands—be they attached or not, and beware those who crawl with their fingers beneath the mist. Those who deliver these trophies will receive modest compensation from the Dúnedain of Cardolan.
You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
The Dúnedain of Cardolan have posted a task to collect large finger bones.
Deliver the large finger bones to a collection box
You have accepted a task to acquire large finger bones.

Wanted: Large finger bones from the barrow-wights stalking Tyrn Gorthad in Cardolan. Claim them from their wretched hands—be they attached or not, and beware those who crawl with their fingers beneath the mist. Those who deliver these trophies will receive modest compensation from the Dúnedain of Cardolan.
